Word Counter - Effortlessly Count Words with a Right-Click

Transform your browsing experience with the Word Counter extension for Chrome! Perfect for students, writers, editors, and professionals, this handy tool allows you to quickly count the words in any selected text with a simple right-click. Whether you're reviewing an article, checking the length of a report, or simply curious about the word count of a paragraph, Word Counter makes it easier than ever.

How to Use:

1.Install the Word Counter extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2.Navigate to any webpage and highlight the text you wish to count.
3.Right-click on the selected text and choose "Count Words."
4.A popup alert will immediately display the word count of your selected text.

Key Features:

Privacy First: Word Counter operates entirely within your browser, ensuring that your data stays private and secure.

Seamless Integration: Once installed, simply highlight the text you want to count, right-click, and select "Count Words" from the context menu.

Instant Results: Get immediate feedback with a popup alert displaying the word count of your selected text.

Lightweight and Efficient: The extension is designed to be minimal and efficient, ensuring it doesn't slow down your browsing experience.

No Setup Required: Easy to install and ready to use immediately. No additional configuration needed.
